description:
Ghosts, UFO's, the unexplained...
The Paranormal Report is a growing show by Jim Harold and Clayton Morris that covers all types of unexplained events that happen around the world.

This app will retrieve the list of episodes and allow you to stream or download them on your webOS phone or TouchPad using wifi or your cell phone data connection.

** These are video shows so please watch your data usage if not using wifi.
** Also the experience is much better on wifi (less stops/freezes).
